review.text: I bought this for my son, who lives in the North Dakota area.  He's 5'3" and 175lbs, which are perfect for him.  He wears a size 7 and a size 8.  I ordered a size 8 and the fit is perfect.  He's tall and has a narrow foot, which is good.  He likes that the shoes are made from a very soft material, which is great.  He's very comfortable with them.  He's a huge fan of the suede that he's worn at the gym
